entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 10:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
